publicwhip.spmotion: *S1M-998 Dr Elaine Murray: Jubilee 2000—That the Parliament congratulates the Jubilee 2000 cyclists on completion of their round Britain cycle ride, organised to draw public attention to the issue of Third World debt and the need for cancellation of those countries’ debts in order that progress can be made in improving the education, housing and health services available to their citizens; notes the progress made by Her Majesty’s Government in cancelling the debt of a number of countries, and urges other G7 nations to follow suit.
S1M-998 Jubilee 2000 (lodged on 12 June 2000) Trish Godman*
S1M-998 Jubilee 2000 (lodged on 12 June 2000) Mr John McAllion*

S1M-998 Dr Elaine Murray: Jubilee 2000—That the Parliament congratulates the Jubilee 2000 cyclists on completion of their round Britain cycle ride, organised to draw public attention to the issue of Third World debt and the need for cancellation of those countries’ debts in order that progress can be made in improving the education, housing and health services available to their citizens; notes the progress made by Her Majesty’s Government in cancelling the debt of a number of countries, and urges other G7 nations to follow suit. Supported by: Trish Godman, Mr John McAllion
S1M-998 Jubilee 2000 (lodged on 12 June 2000) Malcolm Chisholm*, Irene Oldfather*, Linda Fabiani*
S1M-998 Jubilee 2000 (lodged on 12 June 2000) Pauline McNeill*, Mrs Mary Mulligan*
S1M-998 Jubilee 2000 (lodged on 12 June 2000) Nora Radcliffe*, Donald Gorrie*, Mr Michael McMahon*, Elaine Smith*
S1M-998 Jubilee 2000 (lodged on 12 June 2000) Cathy Jamieson*, Johann Lamont*

S1M-998 Dr Elaine Murray: Jubilee 2000—That the Parliament congratulates the Jubilee 2000 cyclists on completion of their round Britain cycle ride, organised to draw public attention to the issue of Third World debt and the need for cancellation of those countries’ debts in order that progress can be made in improving the education, housing and health services available to their citizens; notes the progress made by Her Majesty’s Government in cancelling the debt of a number of countries, and urges other G7 nations to follow suit. Supported by: Trish Godman, Mr John McAllion, Malcolm Chisholm, Irene Oldfather, Linda Fabiani, Pauline McNeill, Mrs Mary Mulligan, Nora Radcliffe, Donald Gorrie, Mr Michael McMahon, Elaine Smith, Cathy Jamieson, Johann Lamont
S1M-998 Jubilee 2000 (lodged on 12 June 2000) Maureen Macmillan*

Supported by: Trish Godman, Mr John McAllion, Malcolm Chisholm, Irene Oldfather, Linda Fabiani, Pauline McNeill, Mrs Mary Mulligan, Nora Radcliffe, Donald Gorrie, Mr Michael McMahon, Elaine Smith, Cathy Jamieson, Johann Lamont, Maureen Macmillan
